snippet.title: BOMBER CAT RUN (Android - IOS runner game)
snippet.description:
Fun and addictive  auto-runner platformer game.Bomber Cat Run is a challenge platform runner game you can play with one hand. There are only two buttons. Jump and stop. Bomber Cat Run plays as a side-scrolling, auto-runner platformer game. The player controls Jazz as he automatically runs from left to right, jumping on his own to clear small gaps or obstacles. The sorcerer kidnapped the owner, Luna. He has to save his owner from the sorcerer's hand. Jazz constantly runs forward, while you time your taps to pull off stylish jumps and moves to gather coins and reach the goal!
To run away from enemies and dodge the obstacles use the halt feature. In Bomber Cat timing is everything.  Lots of challenges platforming obstacles.
